body_html:
pytorch 0.4.1 installs with cuDNN 7.1.4 which I can reproduce this bug on. I've tried the next closest version I could reasonably find 7.2.1 in which this error no longer exists. I also cannot reproduce it any later than that.

I believe the only option you reasonably have is to compile PyTorch from source with a newer cuDNN than 7.1.4.

I believe the only option you reasonably have is to compile PyTorch from source with a newer cuDNN than 7.1.4.
